newsitem.title: UK: Saudi raises Sept crude prices to Europe 20-25cts.
newsitem.headline: Saudi raises Sept crude prices to Europe 20-25cts.

text.p: Saudi Arabia has raised September crude export prices to European customers by 20-25 cents a barrel, trade sources said.
Arab Light for September would be priced at Dated Brent less $1.85 a barrel fob Ras Tanura and Dated Brent less $1.25 fob Sidi Kreir, up 20 cents from August.
Arab Medium was priced at Dated Brent less $2.95 fob Ras Tanura and Dated Brent less $2.35 fob Sidi Kreir, up 25 cents.
Prices to Europe for Arab Heavy and extra light Berri were not immediately available.
